```{r}

bike_spatial <- st_join(bike_coord, DC_data) %>% filter(!is.na(GEOID))

ggplot(DC_data) + 
  geom_sf(aes(fill = IncomeE),size=.1) +
  geom_sf(data = bike_spatial,color='yellow',size=.2) + 
  geom_sf(data = areawater,fill='lightblue',color='lightblue') + 
  geom_sf(data = roads_sub,color='orange') +
  scale_fill_continuous(name = "Median Income", labels = comma, high = "blue", low = "lightgrey") +
  labs(title = "DC Income Estimate by Census Tract") +
  theme_classic() + 
  theme(axis.text = element_blank(),
        axis.ticks = element_blank(),
        axis.line = element_blank()) 
```
